property.name: Text
property.value: Harrowed Dudes do not make Harrowed Pulls this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Play when the number of Dudes in the opposing posse exceeds the number of Dudes in your posse by 2 or more. Your opponent's Draw hand in this shootout round is reduced by 2 ranks (and is considered the best hand of that rank).

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play after you move a Dude with 0 Influence to an in-town Deed. Until after Nightfall, all Dudes have a -1 Influence penalty (minimum 0) while at the Deed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play immediately before you begin a job targeting a card or location controlled by another player. If the job is successful, you gain one Victory Point. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Abomination. There is no limit to the number of Animate Hands that each player may have in play. Animate Hands cannot attach Goods. Card memory does not apply to Animate Hands. Any Dudes with higher Values in a posse opposing an Animate Hand have the ability -'Shootout: Boot this Dude to Ace an Animate Hand in the opposing posse. Reduce this Dude's Bullet rating to 0 until the end of the shootout.'

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Lost Angels

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Weapon. Can only be attached to a Lost Angel Dude. This Dude gains +1 Bullet bonus and a +1 Influence bonus for every other Lost Angel Dude in this location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster:0. Non-Unique. Shootout: Attach a Hex from your Play hand to Ashlar. Ashlar becomes a Stud until the end of the shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Gadget Difficulty: 8 You must boot a Mad Scientist and perform a skill check to put this Deed into play. Controller Noon: Discard a card from your Play hand to create an Automaton at your home (use the discarded card to represent it). The Automaton is a 1-Draw, 0-Influence, Ace-value Gadget token Dude, which counts as 2 Dudes when Acing casualties in a shootout. Discard the Automaton after Nightfall. This action may be used any number of times per turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Job: Boot one of your Dudes to start a job that targets another player's Home. If the job succeeds, that player's maximum hand size is reduced by 1 until the end of the game, and that player must immediately discard down to his or her new maximum hand size if possible. All Dudes in your Posse become Wanted. A player may not be targeted more than once per game with 'Bait and Switch.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Bill's Upkeep cost is 0 while you have Nash Bilton in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. The Production of the Protection Agency is increased by +2 while you have Nash Bilton in play.Controller Shootout: Move one of your Dudes at this location into the current shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist. Horse. Gadget Difficulty: 5 Shootout: Target a Horse in the opposing posse and pull; if the pull is greater than the target's Value, it is Aced. If the pull is red and also greater than the Value of the Dude of the target is attached to, the Dude is aced as well.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Kung-Fu Power: Target one of your unbooted Kung-Fu Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability: 'Reaction: When this Dude is Aced, perform a pull as if he or she were Harrowed (this is not a Harrowed Pull).' Ace this card.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Lost Angels

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-Unique. Abomination. Cannot attach Goods. Shootout: Ace one of your Dudes in this location to make the Bloody Ones a Stud until the end of the shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Noon: All players may reveal their Play hands. Pull 3 times: Players that reveal their Play hand must discard any cards with the same Values (ignoring suits) as the pulls. Players that reveal their Play hand may either gain 3 Ghost Rock or give one of their Dudes a +2 Influence bonus until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. Out of Town. Lost Angels may move from this Deed to Town Square without booting.

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-Unique. Bradley gains a +2 Influence bonus while he has a Gadget Horse attached. Shootout: Target a Goods in the opposing posse. Boot a Gadget Horse attached to Bradley to Ace the target Goods.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Texas Rangers

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Shootout: Boot one of your Dudes in this posse with a lower Value than Patterson. Patterson gains a +1 Bullet bonus until the end of the shootout. This action may be performed any number of times per turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target one of your Dudes. One skill rating on the Dude is increased by 3 until after Nightfall. Until after Nightfall, the Dude's Value is lowered by 3 (minimum A) and the Dude may not move to another location.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Texas Rangers

property.name: Text
property.value: Captain Graham may not be Harrowed. The first time that Captain Graham is Aced during the game, he is not aced but is sent home booted instead with a permanent -1 Bullet penalty and -1 Influence penalty.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster. Noon Hex 7: If this Hex succeeds, this Huckster gains a +3 to his or her Huckster rating until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. This Improvement may only be attached to a Brothel Owner Noon: Target a Dude in this location. Until after Nightfall, that Dude has a -2 Bullet penalty (minimum 0) while at any other location.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: When Gage enters play from your Play hand, Draw a card from your deck and add it to your Play hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Ghost Rock cost of this Improvement is 0 for the Law Dogs and Texas Rangers. This Improvement may only be attached to a Strike. While the Chain Gang is attached to a Strike, the Owner of the Strike collects its Production even if that player does not control it.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Maze Rats

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster:2. Experienced. Noon: Discard a Hex attached to Chao Li to target a Dude at this location. Give the Dude either a -2 Bullet penalty (minimum 0), a -2 Influence penalty (minimum 0), or reduce his or her Value by two (minimum Ace), until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Pull: Boot Charity to target a Dude in the Town Square. If the pull is greater than the Dude's Value, unboot Charity and move the Dude to Charity's location.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Maze Rats

property.name: Text
property.value: May not attach Weapons. Reaction: When you win a round of a shootout, boot Chen to Draw cards equal to the number of ready Weapons in the opposing posse, and add them to your Play hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-Unique. Kung Fu. Chiang may have 2 ready Weapons.

property.value: Public. Out of Town. Controller Reaction: Boot this Deed when you bring a Gadget Horse into play from your Play hand. The Ghost Rock cost of the Gadget Horse is reduced by 3 (minimum 0).

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Boot Wasatch Rails to get a Gadget from your deck or discard pile, show it to the other players, and add it to your Play hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bullet. Shootout: Ace the Consecrated Bullets. Until the end of the shootout, all illegal Draw hands are reduced by 3 ranks and are considered the worst possible hand of that rank.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Job: Boot one of your Dudes to start a job that targets another player's Home. If the job succeeds, the text box on that player's Outfit card is considered blank until after Nightfall next turn, and all Dudes in your Posse become Wanted. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Kung-Fu Power: Target one of your unbooted Kung-Fu Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability: 'Noon: Target a Kung-Fu power on a Dude at this location. The Dude lose the power permanently.' Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target one of your booted Dudes. The Dude is unbooted, but has a -1 Bullet penalty (minimum of 0) and a -1 Influence penalty (minimum of 0) until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. The Upkeep cost and Influence of the Owner's Dudes are reduced by 1 (minimum 0). This does not apply to Terrors or Dudes from other outfits.A Sweetrock player may choose to start with this Deed in play, as if it were a starting Dude. Controller Noon: Boot this Deed to discard one of your Dudes or the Deed itself.

property.value: Huckster:1. Noon: Target a Hex in this location attached to another Dude. Until after Nightfall, Deluse is considered to have a copy of that Hex attached.

property.value: Non-Unique. The Civilian gains a +1 Bullet bonus while he has a ready Weapon with 'Shotgun' in its title or as a trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mystical. This Dude's skills are increased by 1 while Dim Eyes is attached.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dirt-Face may not be selected as a starting Dude. Any player, as a Noon action, may pay 3 Ghost Rock to have Dirt-Face placed in his Owner's discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Give a Maze Rats Dude a +1 Bullet, +1 Influence, or +3 Value (Maximum King) until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may only attach this Improvement to a Deed that you own but do not control. This Deed is worth 0 Control Points and has 0 Upkeep and Production while this Improvement is attached. Owner Noon: Discard this Improvement.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Boot one of your Terrors to call out a Dude in the same or adjc'nt location. If the Dude has a lower Value than your Terror, he or she cannot refuse.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman. Noon Spirit 8: Target a Dude controlled by another player. If this Spirit succeeds, and the Dude belongs to a different outfit than his or her controller, the Dude is discarded.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Kung-Fu Power: Target one of your unbooted Kung-Fu Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability: 'Noon: Call out a Dude at this location. If this location is a saloon, the call-out may not be refused.' Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed. Noon Miracle X: Target a Dude. X is the Value of a target Dude. If this Miracle succeeds and there is another Dude in play with the same name as the target, the target Dude is Aced.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Out of Town. Controller Reaction: Immediately before the Upkeep phase, target an in-town Deed with Production greater than 0. The Deed gains +1 Production until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Lycanthrope. Noon: Boot one of your Mad Scientists at this location to put any one Abomination into play from your Play hand in place of Edward (ignoring all costs and restrictions), and put Edward into your Play hand with all of his attached cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Until after Nightfall, Dudes controlled by a player with more than 8 Ghost Rock in their vault are considered Wanted. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Controller Noon: Target one of your Dudes with Influence greater than 0. The Dude has a -1 Influence penalty (minimum of 0) and a +1 Bullet bonus, until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Target an action from a Kung-Fu Power or a Dude in this shootout. That action cannot be used during this shootout. If the action has already been used during this shootout, any current effects are negated.

Noon Pull: Target an adjacent location that this Cannon has targeted twice this turn. All Dudes in that location with a Value less than the Pull are Aced. This action cannot be used the turn this Cannon enters play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mystical. The cost of Gift of the Thunderbird is reduced to 0 when being attached to a Sioux or Texas Ranger Dude. Noon: Ace Gift of the Thunderbird to target a Huckster in this or an adjacent location. All Hexes attached to the Huckster are aced.

property.value: Experienced. Gordo may have 2 ready Weapons. Shootout: Target a ready Weapon attached to Gordo. One action on that Weapon may be used an additional time this turn.

property.value: While Grady is your lead shooter during a shootout, Grady's Bullet rating is equal to the Bullet rating of the lead shooter in the opposing posse.

This Improvement can only be attached to an out of town Deed. Controller Reaction: Use after another player's Event resolves. This Deed gains a permanent +1 Control Point bonus.

property.value: Non-Unique. You may attach a Mechanical Horse to Harley, Son of David from your Play hand without a skill check and without booting a Mad Scientist. The Ghost Rock cost of the Mechanical Horse must still be paid. Harley will not trade away a Mechanical Horse.

property.value: Noon: Give a Law Dogs Dude a +1 Bullet, +1 Influence, or +3 value (maximum King) until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman. Noon Spirit 7: If this Spirit succeeds, get one non-Gadget Horse from your deck or discard pile, show it to your opponents, and add it to your Play hand. Shuffle your deck. Reaction Spirit 6: Play after Draw hands are compared in a shootout. If this Spirit succeeds, you may Ace any number of non-Gadget Horses in your posse. Each Horse aced reduces your casualties by one.

property.value: Experienced-2. Noon: Boot Findley to gain Ghost Rock equal to his Influence. Findley has a -3 Influence penalty (minimum 0) until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster. Noon Hex X: Target a Dude at this location. X is equal to the target's Value plus Influence plus Bullet rating. If this Hex succeeds, the Dude is turned face-down until after Nightfall next turn. While face-down, the Dude is considered out of play except for uniqueness purposes.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. The controller of this Deed may attach Goods to his or her Dudes at this Deed for 1 less Ghost Rock (minimum 0).

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target a Huckster in play. The Huckster gains +1 Influence until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Starting with the Winner and going clockwise, each player may boot one of their Terrors. When a Terror boots in this way, all Dudes in play with both lower Value and Influence than the Terror are booted. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Target a printed Shootout action on one of your Dudes in this shootout and another Dude in that posse. The target Dude is considered to have the ability until after this round of the shootout.

property.value: Noon Kung-Fu Power: Target one of your unbooted Kung-Fu Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability: 'Shootout: Target a Dude in the opposing posse with a lower Value and Bullet rating than this Dude. Boot this Dude to send the target Dude home booted.' Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: All Deeds with 'Laundry' in their title or traits are worth 1 extra Control Point while 'The Kid' is in play. Noon: Discard a card from your Play hand to call out a Dude in this location. If you control this location, the call out may not be refused.

Otherwise, the Dude becomes Wanted. Cheatin'! cards may not be played on that player during this draw, and this action cannot be used if one has already been played.

If the pull is greater than the Dude's Value, the Dude is aced.

property.value: Maze Rats

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist:3. Noon: Boot Professor Crowe to target a Mad Scientist at this location. Until after Nightfall, the target's Mad Scientist skill is increased by Professor Crowe's Mad Scientist skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Boot one of your Dudes in this shootout to move him or her out of the shootout to any location in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist. Unique. Sidekick. Gadget Difficulty: 4. While R.H. II is attached to a Dude in a shootout, he is considered a Dude in the posse and has a 1 Stud Bullet rating. If R.H. II is moved out of the shootout, he boots, is still attached to this Dude and is no longer considered a Dude. If R.H. II is Aced in a shootout, he is not aced but discarded instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Give a Collegium Dude a +1 Bullet, +1 Influence, or +3 value (maximum King) until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Give a Texas Ranger Dude a +1 Bullet, +1 Influence, or +3 value (maximum King) until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster:0. The Reverend may be targeted as though he were a Blessed. The Reverend's Hexes are also considered Miracles. Noon: If the Reverend's Value is greater than Ace, permanently reduce his Value by 2 (minimum A) to increase his Huckster skill by 2 until after Nightfall.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Texas Rangers

property.name: Text
property.value: Robert Jones may have two ready Weapons, and receives a +1 Bullet bonus for each Weapon he has ready.

property.name: Text
property.value: Weapon. Reaction: Play after Draw hands are compared in a shootout. Boot the .44 if you have a hand rank equal to or better than a Full House, but lost this round of the shootout. The opposing posse suffers a casualty.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Texas Rangers

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you have Drawn your Draw hand in a shootout, but before you exchange cards using your Draw bonuses, discard 2 cards from your Draw hand to draw 2 new cards. You may only use this action if Mack is your lead Shooter.

property.name: Text
property.value: During shootouts, Running Moose has an additional Bullet bonus equal to the number of Shaman in his posse.

property.name: Text
property.value: During a shootout, Ruth gains a +1 Bullet bonus for each Huckster in her posse.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman. Shootout Spirit 6: If this Spirit succeeds and you own this location, this Shaman gains a +3 Bullet bonus and becomes a Stud until the end of the shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability: 'Reaction: After another non-Harrowed Dude has been Aced in this location, boot this Dude to gain a permanent +1 Bullet bonus.' Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman. Noon Spirit 6: If this Spirit succeeds, this Shaman gains a +3 to his or her Shaman rating until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-Unique. While the Security Guard is in a posse, effects that raise or lower hand ranks have no effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Kung-Fu Power: Target one of your unbooted Kung-Fu Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability: 'Reaction: Boot this Dude after you reveal Draw hands in a shootout and this Dude is in your posse. Your posse suffers one less casualty.' Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. Casino. Controller Noon: All players must place 1 Ghost Rock (if able) on this Deed. At the end of Nightfall, the current controller gains the Ghost Rock on the Deed. If this Deed leaves play, return the Ghost Rock to the bank.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Maze Rats

property.name: Text
property.value: Harrowed. Kung-Fu.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Strike. Controller Reaction: Boot this Strike immediately before the Upkeep phase. If you do not have any Ghost Rock in your Vault, gain 3 Ghost Rock.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Sioux Union

property.name: Text
property.value: Silver Wolf has a +1 Influence bonus for each other unbooted Shaman at his location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster. Noon Hex X: Declare a number from 1 to 5. X is three times the declared number. If this hex succeeds, this Huckster gains an Influence bonus equal to the number until after Nightfall, and this Hex is Aced. If this Hex fails, this Huckster loses one Influence permanently (minimum 0).

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Lost Angels

property.name: Text
property.value: Sister Leila gains a +1 Bullet bonus and a +1 Influence bonus for each Mystical Goods she has attached.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Private. Strike. Any Dude that is not a Terror has a -1 Bullet penalty (minimum 0) while in a shootout at this location. Controller Noon: Ace this Deed to discard all Dudes at this Deed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed:2. Noon: Boot Solomon to Draw a card and add it to your Play hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target two of your Dudes at the same location. Until after Nightfall, and while they are at a different location from each other, the Dudes gain a +1 Influence bonus and have their Value increased by 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist. You must boot a Mad Scientist to put this card into play. Owner Reaction: Play immediately before this Deed is Aced. Ace this Improvement instead of this Deed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Players cannot gain Ghost Rock during High Noon this turn.

card.name: Step Back to Ward Off Monkey

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Kung-Fu Power: Target one of your unbooted Kung-Fu Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability: 'Shootout: Move this Dude home, booted.' Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have Steve in play, any time a Joker is part of your final Draw hand during a shootout, your hand rank is increased by 1 rank and is considered the worst possible hand of that rank. If you ever lose a round of a shootout, Steve is discarded from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Strike. The Production of this Strike is equal to the highest Mad Scientist rating in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Abomination. Cannot attach Goods. 'Tabitha' may only enter play if the Fear level is above 5. Shootout: Play when Tabitha is the only Dude in your posse. She becomes a Stud and gains a +2 Bullet bonus until the end of the shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Kung-Fu Power: Target one of your unbooted Kung-Fu Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the card text: 'Card effects cannot Ace this Dude. This will not prevent a Dude from being aced as a result of a shootout.' Ace this card.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Lost Angels

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed:0. Teresa gains a +3 bonus to her Blessed skill while in a shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-Unique. Kung Fu.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist:1. Experienced. Reaction: Boot Xemo before you Draw your Draw hand during the Gambling phase. If the top card of your discard pile is an Event, put it on top of your deck.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Sioux Union

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-Unique. The Ancients may boot to join a posse as if they were in an adjacent location.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Sioux Union

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-Unique. The Bloodless may not call out other Dudes.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist. Gadget Difficulty: 6. Shootout: Target a Dude in the opposing posse. The Dude is sent home, booted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist. Unique. Horse. Gadget Difficulty: 7 Can only be put into play by a Collegium player. Attaches to Fineas von Landingham without cost. Shootout: Boot the Damacles to move this Dude and any number of your other Dudes in this location into the current shootout, or out of the shootout, booted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Boot one of your Dudes with the Kung-Fu trait to target another of your Dudes in the same location with a lower Value. Boot the target Dude. Until the end of the game that Dude has the Kung-Fu trait. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Until after Nightfall, the Fear level is increased by 2, and all Dudes with Huckster, Blessed, Shaman and Mad Scientist skills gain a +2 bonus to their skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Spells targeting the Lurking Fear have their difficulty increased by 4.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Controller Noon: Boot this Deed and target one of your Kung-Fu Dudes. The Dude gains a +1 Bullet bonus until after Nightfall for each Kung-Fu Power he has. Controller Shootout: Boot this Deed and target one of your Kung-Fu Dudes in this shootout. The Dude gains a +1 Bullet bonus until the end of the shootout for each Kung-Fu Power he has.

property.name: Text
property.value: Until after Nightfall, no player may win the game unless he or she has the most (or tied for the most) total bullets in play. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Until after Nightfall, actions printed on Dudes may not be used.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Maze Rats

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-Unique. May not move to in-town Deeds. The Swarm can only be put into play by a Maze Rats player. Noon: Move this Dude to a Strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon: Target a Spell attached to one of your Dudes that has been used this turn. The Spell may not be used again this turn. The Dude that has the Spell attached becomes Wanted and the Spell is Aced after Nightfall if still in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist:3. Theodore may only create Horse Gadgets.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Only Terrors can call out Timmy. Shootout Pull: Target a Dude in the opposing posse. If the pull plus Timmy's Value is greater than the Dude's Value, the Dude is a Draw and has his or her Bullet rating reduced to 0 until the end of the shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Tucker has +1 Production while he is in a Saloon. Noon: Play when Tucker is in a Saloon. Target another Dude in the Saloon to move that Dude to the Town Square, booted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play when a player receives Ghost Rock as a result of a card effect. The player does not gain the Ghost Rock, and must pay that amount to the Bank instead, up to the total amount in his or her Vault.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster. Noon Hex 8: Boot this Huckster to target a Dude in your discard pile. If this Hex is successful, put the target into play, normally. The target's Ghost Rock cost is reduced by the Huckster's skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: All Drifters and all Dudes controlled by outfits of a different faction than their controller have their Values reduced by 5 (minimum A) until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Abomination. For each dude that is Aced at the same location, the Vampiric Dance Hall Girl gains +1 Bullet until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. During each round of a shootout at this location, the losing posse suffers one additional casualty.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Out of Town. Harrowed Dudes and Hucksters have +2 Influence for the purposes of controlling this Deed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target a location you control. The next time one or more Dudes move to the target location, each Dude must pull: If the pull is greater than the Dude's Value, the Dude is sent home booted. If the pull is greater than the Value plus 5, the Dude is Aced. This action has no cost if J.P. Coleman is at the target location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-Unique. Public. Saloon. Any Dude Aced while at Water Lou's is removed from play permanently. No other copy of that Dude may enter play for the rest of the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon: Target a Horse at this Deed. The Horse is unbooted, and actions on the Horse may be used an additional time this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: When one of your Dudes is targeted with an action, Ace a Spell attached to one of your Dudes to cancel the action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Target a Dude immediately after he or she moves to a Deed you control and have at least one Dude at. Send all of your Dudes at the Deed home booted. The target's controller must Pull: If the Pull is greater than the target's Value, he or she is Aced.

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-Unique. Only Hucksters may call out the Widow Withers.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sidekick. Noon: Target a Dude in this location. Boot Wild Dingos to call out the target Dude, who cannot refuse. Reaction: Perform immediately after Draw hands are compared in a shootout and you have lost the round. Ace Wild Dingos to reduce your casualties by 2. The attached Dude gains a +2 Bullet bonus and is a Stud for the next round of the shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Noon: Call out a Dude at this location. You may only use this action if William is Wanted.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Agency

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Reaction: When a player targets another one of your Dudes in this location with an action, boot Windows to cancel the action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Kung-Fu Power: Target one of your unbooted Kung-Fu Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability: 'Reaction: Play after this Dude's posse wins a round of a shootout. This Dude gains a +2 Bullet bonus until the end of the shootout, and the opposing posse may not chicken out of this shootout.' Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Give an Agency Dude a +1 Bullet, +1 Influence, or +3 value (maximum King) until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play when a Dude moves out of a location. Boot one of your Dudes at the same location to cancel the move. Any costs of the move (such as booting) remain paid.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target a Deed. Boot all Dudes at the Deed with 0 Influence.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Maze Rats

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist:0. Yung Kim gains a +3 bonus to his Mad Scientist skill while creating a Gadget Horse.

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-Unique. Abomination. The Upkeep cost of Zombie Miners is reduced by 1 (minimum 0) while controlled by a Maze Rats player. While the Zombie Miners are at a Strike you control, the Strike's production is increased by +2.
